actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To establish a deficit reduction trust fund and a build America trust fund in the Treasury of the United States.
short_title: Deficit Reduction Trust Fund Act of 1992

summary.text: Deficit Reduction Trust Fund Act of 1992 - Establishes the Deficit Reduction Trust Fund. Tranfers to such Fund amounts as specified by Acts of Congress. Requires investment in U.S. bonds of a portion of such Fund. Establishes the Build America Trust Fund consisting of interest earned on obligations in the Deficit Reduction Trust Fund.

titles.title: Deficit Reduction Trust Fund Act of 1992
To establish a deficit reduction trust fund and a build America trust fund in the Treasury of the United States.
